fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Wait until the late game and then become VITAL.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once only half the players remain, gain 3 town abilities of your choice. The abilities must be from different subalignments. You also become Neutral (Evil), gaining the wincon of "See the town lose the game".
- You cannot get abilities that harm you.
- Once you use all your abilities, gain a new set of abilities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town goal OR See the town lose the game at all costs.
